overview: Finish Line Ministries founder Dave Bogue serves as host for this video based on his message of revival. Through entertaining and thought-provoking stories such as "Pickle Pickin'," -- which chronicles Bogue's days as an adolescent obliged to spend his vacation helping his cousins harvest cucumbers -- he challenges and entreats Christians to obey God's word. Filmed in Kentucky, the program includes interviews and re-enactments.
title: Pickle Pickin'
